\newcommand{\bmvd}{{\mbox{\tt \,*->\,}}}              % " + inheritable
\newcommand{\Fd}{{\mbox{\tt \,=>\,}}}                      % scalar signature
\newcommand{\Mvd}{{\mbox{\tt \,=>\,}}}  % multivalued signature
